_source.text: A 77-inch television with a curved screen and resolution four times better than today's high-definition TV will be a centerpiece of LG Electronics' product line-up at next week's International CES in Las Vegas.

text: A 77-inch television with a curved screen and resolution four times **better** **than** today's **high**-definition TV will be a centerpiece of LG Electronics' product line-up at **next** week's International CES in **Las** **Vegas**.

_source.text: Abound Solar's next-generation cadmium telluride (CdTe) thin-film modules use a proven technology that performs better than crystalline silicon in low light and high temperature conditions resulting in more energy produced per watt of capacity.

_source.text: 68 ' Thou 'st have that horse,' his master said, ' If that one thing thou wilt tell me ; Why that horse is better than any other, I pray thee, Tom Pots, shew thou to me.' 69 ' That horse is old, of stomach bold, And well can he skill of his train ; If I be out of my saddle cast, He '1 either stand still or turn again.' 70 ' Thou 'st have the horse with all my heart.

_source.text: After considering the matter a little, she swore that she would marry none but the beautiful Fanfarinet, that there was no reason for thinking his master would be as beautiful, and she had no ambition to marry one of high rank; that if she had lived happily' in a tower, she could live happily, if need be, in some castle in the country with him, and that she would think bread and water in his company better than chicken and sugar-plums with any body else.

_source.text: ² Self-referential example: I was a little proud of myself for not posting this note when I first completed it, specifically because: by now, I really should know better than to post lengthy complex comments at 2AM... but too often, I do anyway.
